release.change: Maintain aspect ratio in video player
Ability to load external subtitles (srt files)
Player controls toggles visibility properly on tapping the screen
Update a bunch of dependencies including exoplayer
isReady button will only work after any media is opened
Remove "youtube" label in URL media selection
App is now fully open source and free from ads!
Fixed crashes while specifying URL without port.
Fixed seek command which was not being sent to the server before.
Known issue: Video may not load for URLs initially. Load a local video first to fix this.
Fix potential crashes (few may remain but thank you for reporting).
Instrumented the code to make debugging easier.
NEW: Changed player to exoplayer. More stable!
Some core refactoring and bug fixes.
Web URL support added (YouTube coming soon!)
Minimize/background playback should work without crashing (thanks for feedback).
Added isReady toggle button in overlay.
Back button is more responsive from video player.
Clean up a few erroneous error messages.
Auto-load subtitles (srt with same name) on 4.1 and above.
Added feedback button and share button.
Fixed duplicate dialog window being opened after clicking add.
Fixed crashes in the file picker.
Reminder dialog box to review/rate this app (Need your honest reviews).
